code:
graph TB
    subgraph "monbus_axil_group"
        subgraph "Monitor Bus Input"
            MON_IN[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> PARSE[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        end

        subgraph "Per-Protocol Filtering"
            PARSE --> FILTER[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
            AXI_MASK[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> FILTER
            AXIS_MASK[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> FILTER
            CORE_MASK[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> FILTER
        end

        subgraph "Routing Decision"
            FILTER --> DROP{HealthTech_PatientRecords}
            DROP --> |No| ERR_CHK{HealthTech_LabAnalyzer}
            DROP --> |Yes| DISCARD[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
            ERR_CHK --> |Yes| ERR_PATH[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
            ERR_CHK --> |No| WR_PATH[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        end

        subgraph "Error/Interrupt Path"
            ERR_PATH --> ERR_FIFO[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
            ERR_FIFO --> AXIL_S[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
            ERR_FIFO --> IRQ[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        end

        subgraph "Master Write Path"
            WR_PATH --> WR_FIFO[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
            WR_FIFO --> ADDR_GEN[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
            CFG_BASE[HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> ADDR_GEN
            ADDR_GEN --> AXIL_M[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        end
    end

    AXIL_S --> S_AR[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    AXIL_S --> S_R[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    AXIL_M --> M_AW[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    AXIL_M --> M_W[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    AXIL_M --> M_B[HealthTech_PatientRecords]

    style FILTER fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style ERR_FIFO fill:#fbb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style WR_FIFO fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style ADDR_GEN fill:#ffb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style IRQ fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
